message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Can you meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $16000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14500. Can you consider that?
I understand your desire to get closer to the price you had in mind, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'll sell the product to you for $15800. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14500 is a bit too high. Can you consider $14200?
I understand your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'll sell the product to you for $14500. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $13800. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. Can you consider that?
